name: Ninja Frog and the Clock Dice
name_original: Ninja Frog and the Clock Dice
description:
(Game Jam GMTK 2022 ) A retro style game of a frog who must travel a world, things get complicated when every 5 seconds a random event occurs controlled by a dice.

This is my first participation in a game jam the game was done in 48 hours I hope you like it :)
